reference.title: Import Keystore dialog
reference.shortdesc: Allows you to import a keystore created outside of MOTODEV Studio for use within MOTODEV Studio's Signing and Keys view.

section.p: This dialog is displayed when you click (Import Keystore) in the Signing and Keys view.

strow.stentry: Path to the keystore file to be imported.
List of keystore types (JKS, JCEKS, or PCKS12). The keystore being imported must be one of the listed types, and you must identify the keystore's type using this list.
